Issue.creator: vijaypunugubati
Issue.summary: DefineSupportCode is deprecated in run-test-cucumber fails the fabric-sdk-node-merge job
Issue.description: fabric-sdk-node@1.4.0-snapshot test:cucumber /w/workspace/fabric-sdk-node-merge-x86_64/gopath/src/github.com/hyperledger/fabric-sdk-node 16:22:16 > cucumber-js ./test/scenario/features/*.feature 16:22:16 16:22:18 (node:8082) DeprecationWarning: cucumber: defineSupportCode is deprecated. Please require/import the individual methods instead./ {code} *Build log:* https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/view/fabric-sdk-node/job/fabric-sdk-node-merge-x86_64/32/consoleFull >
